name: Slenderman's Holiday
description:
Experience the game they're calling "The most scary, I mean merry, game of all time" - Now even more merry!

Slenderman Holidays is a BRAND NEW RPG holiday based horror game based upon the Slenderman urban legend and "Der GroBmann" myth.

What will Slender be doing this holiday season? Eating children? Unwrapping presents? Baking cookies? All of the above, oh and don't worry, he'll be still wandering the woods aimlessly with those damn notes littering his home.

Santa has come to town, and it's your job as Slender to terrorize his workshop! Will your slender physique be enough to deal with the big man himself?
